snippet: Carly Simon is joining the pack of musicians who have gone from writing and performing for the stage to telling all in memoirs.
abstract: Singer Carly Simon will write an autobiography to be published by Random House.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN and ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Carly Simon is joining the pack of musicians who have gone from writing and performing for the stage to telling all in memoirs.

headline.main: Carly Simon to Share Her Life Story in Book
headline.print_headline: Carly Simon to Share Her Life Story in Book
